name: Bounty Board
description:
Title: Bounty Board

Platform: HTML

Genre: Text-Based Adventure

Rating: E

Target Market: 12+, casual gamers

Game Overview:

As a Bounty Hunter, you make money hunting difficult bounties. This bounty will test your skills, allowing you to join the Hunter's Guild if you are successful.

This text-based adventure game allows you to make choices throughout the story to navigate your way towards a winning screen and become a successful hunter.

Instructions: Click the play arrow to play on your browser.

Game Design Team:

Ethan Landrum - Game Designer
